entries.summary: Initial governance schemas, MVSS policy resolver, and standards gateway manifest.
Standards gateway run scripts, changelog schema/automation, and pass-first smoke updates.
Serve viewer from gateway, add health check, and standardize changelog gate behavior.
Add due process schemas, action registry checks, and rights standards endpoint.
Unify action schema and harden standards gateway with index, cache headers, and rate limit.
Add due-process bundle flags, shutdown smoke script, and standards gateway headers.

Secure Swarm v0.1 wire formats finalized (signed_message_v1, sealed_envelope_v1, evidence_bundle_v1, consensus_summary_v1); pipeline now emits evidence_bundle.json + consensus_summary.json with audit consensus gates.
